message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. It's a fair start.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but how about we try something a little different this time? Time is money after all.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of the inflation. Let's get this done.
Alice, it seems we're at an impasse. This offer reflects the time pressure, but I'm hoping you'll see its value.
